MONDELĒZ INTERNATIONAL PROGRESS REPORT | 2015
SUSTAINABILITYCalling on our Suppliers  
for Responsible Sourcing
We work with thousands of suppliers, consultants 
and business partners around the world. We are taking steps to align what they do for us with our own values and goals.
We have laid out our expectations to all our 
direct suppliers in our published supplier contract provisions  and supply chain transparency  
statements.
As a founding member 
of AIM-PROGRESS , 
we also adhere to the Sedex Member Ethical Trade Audit protocol. This audit evaluates our internal manufacturing sites and suppliers against a common set of Corporate Social Responsibility standards to drive efficiency on performance improvement for the consumer goods industry. In 2015, 286 of our key suppliers – 99 percent of our 2015 target group of highest priority suppliers – completed the audit, in addition to the 388 suppliers audited in 2014.
